title: Managing Your Money: Finding Value Amid Global Turmoil
description: Barron's Associate Editor Reshma Kapadia speaks with veteran value investor Sarah Ketterer, chief executive officer of Causeway Capital Management, about opportunities in foreign stocks and career advice for younger investors.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Barron's Associate Editor Reshma Kapadia speaks with veteran value investor Sarah Ketterer, chief executive officer of Causeway Capital Management, about opportunities in foreign stocks and career advice for younger investors.
